Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "fostering affordability and integrity through reasonable (FAIR) business practices act"
Summary: Enacts the "fostering affordability and integrity through reasonable (FAIR) business practices act", to expand the attorney general's ability to protect New Yorkers from unfair, deceptive and abusive business practices.
LawCode: Add Art 22-A §348, amd Art 22-A Art Head, §§349, 349-c, 350-c & 350-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "fostering affordability and integrity through reasonable (FAIR) business practices act"
